channel.title: Anyone Know If "Have A Shexy Pahtay" Is A Rare Mission?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Anyone Know If "Have A Shexy Pahtay" Is A Rare Mission?"

item.title: Re: Anyone Know If "Have A Shexy Pahtay" Is A Rare Mission?
item.content:encoded: although i think that the ro-sham-bo redux team can also do the trick if u have a chakra armor or k-dogs headband

item.title: Re: Anyone Know If "Have A Shexy Pahtay" Is A Rare Mission?
item.content:encoded:
You can get it only from global B rank missions. Same with Yuri's "Clean up a Shexy Pahty".

Best way to get "J-Diddy" is to go with "Crazy Love Triangle" for global B missions and when you get "Have A Shexy Pahtay" go to team change into "Femme Fatales Bonus!" and in mission use "Epic Dog Urination Technique".

item.title: Anyone Know If "Have A Shexy Pahtay" Is A Rare Mission?
item.content:encoded: Or does the RNG Monster just hate me?
